title_full:
Abby Echiverri

            —
            Sketches on Loss and Levity

Florian T M Zeisig

              —
              Music for Parents
            
              (Métron Records)
label: Métron Records
description:
Berlin’s lowkey ambient wunderkind follows on the promise of his acclaimed albums since 2018 - solo and as half of OCA - with a completely lush study in Vibroacoustic therapy intended to help his parents sleep better.

The hour long suite stems from Florian TM Zeisig’s rare visit to his parents’ gaff in rural Bavaria a few years ago, where he discovered they had... more

label: Daisart
description:
Relaxation aids from Picnic, the duo of Ju Ca and mdo, trailing the glistening wake of a lovely 2020 debut on Kansas City’s c- with a milky ambient bath featuring added suds by Huerco S, The Humble Bee, DJ Paradise (uon), and Dntel

On their eponymous sophomore outing picnic reveal a fuller picture of their sound. The eight original pieces are given to... more

title_full:
Laura Cannell, Stewart Lee and Friends

              —
              THESE FERAL LANDS, Vol. 1
            
              (Brawl Records)
label: Brawl Records
description:
Laura Cannell invites Stewart Lee, foghorn fetishist Jennifer Lucy Allen, Irish cellist Kate Ellis, and musician/writer Polly Wright to the table for a suite of haunting, real and imagined musical lanndscapes

Laura’s follow-up to her superb ‘Sing As The Crow Flies’ album with Polly Wright, and unexpected synth-pops as Hunteress for our Documenting Sound... more

label: Primordial Void
description:
From the fecund Brussels undergrowth that produced Oï les Ox; Roxane Métayer yields her slow burning, hallucinogenic drone-folk storytelling style to Primordial Void after a debut with Morc earlier this year 

‘Paroles Cavernicoles’ (or literally ‘Cave Lyrics’) explores a space between wizened folk and avant garde experimentation, unfurling creaking strings and... more

title_full:
ROBERT CURGENVEN

              —
              Tailte Cré-Umha (Bronze Lands) (Live at Cork Midsummer Festival)
            
              (Recorded Fields Editions)
label: Bronze Lands
description:
Seriously lifted material from Robert Curgenven that amplifies Ireland's biggest pipe organ on a dub soundsystem. Bowel churning pre-Christian drones for anyone into Oren Ambarchi, FUJI||||||||||TA, Kali Malone, Áine O'Dwyer et al.

Recorded live in 2018 at Cork Midsummer Festival, "Tailte Cré-Umha (Bronze Lands)" is an all-acoustic solo performance for St Fin... more

label: Marionette
description:
Francesco Cavaliere & Tomoko Sauvage explore the semiotics of the colour green in a probing, quietly absorbing suite of records from their ongoing and highly promising collaboration.

Both responsible for some of the most beguiling releases in recent memory, Tomoko Sauvage brings her porcelain bowls, water sounds and array of hydrophones to Francesco... more

Hiro Kone

label: Dais Records
description:
NYC shapeshifter Hiro Kone is joined by Speaker Music (DeForrest Brown Jr), travis (ONO), and Muqata’a for a more fluid navigation of electronics, dark ambient sound design, and chamber classical.

Crafted during lockdown, ’Silvercoat The Throng’ is Hiro Kone’s most personalised set of recordings yet, written under the title’s poetic directive to create... more

Exquisite shadowplay from Sardinian, Saffronkeira and his Persian spar, Siavash Amini; sensitively underdoing each other for a fine album of atmospheric electro-acoustic inference

"Upon hearing a small snippet of sound an image is conjured, not a memory but not unfamiliar. A shell of a memory, thousand events superimposed on each other. While trying to extract... more

title_full:
Norman W. Long

              —
              BLACK BROWN GRAY GREEN
            
              (Hausu Mountain)
label: Hausu Mountain
description:
Intense oscillations, dense field recordings, demonic percussion and heady psychedelic noise splatter from Chicago's Norman W. Long. RIYL BJ Nilsen, Speaker Music or Byron Westbrook.

There's a refreshing level of confidence that comes with opening your album on a 22-minute live performance. "SOUTHEAST - LIVE 2019" is the ideal doorway into Long's... more
